Identity.History: "On the barrow began / a great bonfire, / from the torches of soldiers / smoke arose."\nUnknown, Beowulf, 8th century CE.
Identity.Tooltip: A great burial mound is the perfect way to honour a fallen chieftain. The local connection with such an important figure from the past will certainly improve your claim to the land.\nBring glory to your civilization and add large tracts of land to your empire.
